Concurrent Thought

Concurrent Thought works on Big Data tools reflecting the evolving state of hardware, cloud and other virtualization trends, as well as our current understanding of optimal computing strategies for streaming and batch-mode applications.

Concurrent Thought was started by Dean Wampler, Ph.D.. Dean has been cited as one of the most influential people in the Big Data ecosystem, in large part because of his many talks at conferences, which are available at polyglotprogramming.com.

For more information, send us email.
